participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to express herself through singing and playing.
participant_1.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i am in the third grade. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and caring, enjoys creative activities and has a nurturing side.
participant_2.background: i enjoy coloring books. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. my husband is adopted.
